snippet: The young pianist Michael Brown, a double prizewinner, added his own composition and a lost work by George Perle to the repertory at Weill Recital Hall.
abstract: Alan Kozinn reviews performance by pianist Michael Brown at Weill Recital Hall.
lead_paragraph: The young pianist Michael Brown, a double prizewinner, added his own composition and a lost work by George Perle to the repertory at Weill Recital Hall.

headline.seo: Michael Brown Performs George Perle Piano Rarity at Weill
headline.main: A Young Pianist Uncovers an Addition to the Repertory
headline.print_headline: A Young Pianist Uncovers An Addition to the Repertory
